instruction: Design a movie poster for the film "Cabin in the Woods"
output: The movie poster for the film "Cabin in the Woods" should feature a menacing cabin in the woods with dramatic lightning striking in the background. In the foreground of the poster should be the silhouettes of three people, representing the protagonists of the film, running away from the cabin in fear and terror. The poster should also feature the title of the movie in bold font and the tagline “Be careful what you wish for.”
